original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1156)@</color>瞬間移動到敵方體力最少的武將背後以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1156)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>造成物理傷害，並且再以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1366)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，若目標體力低於 <color=#ccffcc>20%</color> 則額外增加 <color=#ccffcc>20%</color> 傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1156)@</color> instantly move behind the enemy general with the least physical strength to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str (1156)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage, and then uses <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1366)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color>Inflict physical damage to the enemy within its own range. If the target's physical strength is lower than <color=#ccffcc>20%</color>, additional <color=#ccffcc>20%</color> damage will be added.
